events.description: Our February project update meeting via Discord to discuss major club updates and ongoing work. Professionals will attend, offering a great opportunity for involvement.
Unwind with Scientista over a latte and some treats at Tous Les Jours Cafe.

events.eventName: Guided Hike with a Bureau of Land Management Ranger at Sloan Canyon Petroglyph Site
events.description: Join a guided hike on the Petroglyph Trail in Sloan Canyon National Conservation Area to learn about Mojave Desert plants, wildlife, and local history with a Park Ranger.

events.eventName: It's Just Coffee: Mental Health in America
events.description: Participate in a dialogue about mental health in America, sharing viewpoints openly with a facilitator and no expertise required. Coffee, tea, and snacks provided.

events.description: Attend an expert-led workshop to prepare for the LSAT Reading Comprehension section with sample questions.

Join for weekly guided meditation to relax and center yourself. No registration is needed.

events.eventName: Word Games Japanese Student Alliance General Meeting
events.description: Play Word Wolf and E-Shiritori games with the Japanese Student Alliance. Knowledge of Japanese is not required.

events.eventName: ALPFA x Eide Bailly Early Career Panel
events.description: Hear from professionals in accounting and business about internships, career growth, and building a long-term career.

events.eventName: I Guess We'll See You Next Lifetime
events.description: Send off Black History Month by making perfume, enjoying soul food, and listening to neo soul music.

Enjoy cultural games, interactive activities, and diverse foods while connecting with fellow Rebels.

Join a potluck-style event to embrace diverse cultures in the Honors College through food and community.

events.description: Celebrate Black History Month with a panel on Black resistance, civil disobedience, and collective action inspired by John Lewis.

Learn clear communication strategies for success, including writing tips from the UNLV Writing Center.
Explore event spaces and services with workshops on planning, catering, and marketing for events.
Eat at Panda Express to support the Hospitality Collective fundraiser.

events.description: Learn to handle conflict with grace by identifying triggers and practicing resolution strategies themed with Spongebob.

events.description: Join military-connected students for a meeting with free food, swag, and planning for Operation Battle Born.
